TestGroupDocumentation.Title: Content Tree tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the pattern-2.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a NCName restricted SimpleType. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet001 - setting a valid value and validating a content tree using Validator
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls the pattern-2-3.xml document, changes the document value to the valid value 'uena' and validates the content tree.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet002 - setting an invalid value and validating a content tree using Validator
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls the pattern-2-4.xml document, changes the document value to the invalid value and validates the content tree.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet003 - setting a valid value and validating a content tree using Validator
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a document, sets the document value to the valid value 'vthi' and validates the content tree.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: GetSet007 - setting an invalid value and validating a content tree using Validator
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates a document, sets the document value to the invalid value and validates the content tree.
